Love the ankle elastic and length, it’s perfect! The shoulder is frilly and cute, adjustable too! As far as the “V” in front… there’s a button and it doesn’t show boob at all, I usually hate the open front but this covers everything! Give it a try… you’ll love it! Delivered next day!!! What can I say? Very happy that I can dress it up or go casual… thumbs up 4 sure!
